property_title: New Studio Apartment For Sale in Albufeira
property_description:
This brand new studio for sale is located in the heart of Olhos D’Água, in Albufeira, just minutes from the beach and all amenities. Currently under construction, this development will comprise 20 apartments, ranging from T0 to T1+1, and is expected to be completed in December 2024.

Situated on the ground floor, this apartment will feature an entry hall, a fitted kitchen equipped with Bosch appliances, an open-plan dining and lounge area, a spacious bedroom, and a bathroom. Both the lounge and bedroom have direct access to a large private terrace.

Residents of this condominium will enjoy the benefit of a communal swimming pool, landscaped gardens, a rooftop terrace and a convenient underground garage for private parking.

Additional features include:air conditioning, double glazed windows, communal lift, electric shutters, fitted wardrobes, solar panels.

Nestled in Albufeira, Olhos D'Água is a cherished coastal haven for residents, offering a tranquil escape amidst its natural springs, sandy shores, and scenic cliffs. This development is within walking distance to a wide array of amenities, including local restaurants, cafes, and supermarkets, and just a 10 minute walk from the pristine beach of Olhos D’Água.

property_title: Three Bedroom Contemporary  Apartment Located in a Popular Area of Albufeira
property_description:
Recently renovated with high quality finishes throughout you are automatically greeted by a bright open plan kitchen, fully equipped with modern appliances, and a substantial living/dining area.

The south-facing terrace, accessed through patio doors, offers a perfect way to unwind in the Algarvian sunshine. 

Boasting three spacious bedrooms, including a master bedroom with en-suite, and an additional shower room/toilet this apartment is sold furnished and is perfectly situated within a short walking distance of the city centre, historic old town, supermarkets and the magnificent beaches located in this popular resort.

Perfectly positioned in the centre of the Algarve, Albufeira is the ideal destination to explore the Algarve.
With its exceptional nightlife, bars and restaurants Albufeira has something for everyone.
Call us today to  arrange a visit to this fantastic property

property_title: Stylish  Fully Renovated 3 bedroom  Two-Unit Townhouse in the Heart of Guia – Albufeira
property_description:
This beautifully renovated two-storey semi-detached townhouse is located in the heart of the picturesque village of Guia, in the municipality of Albufeira. Set on a 75 m² plot with a private gross area of 110.75 m², the property has undergone a complete transformation by a highly regarded interior architect, who created a modern and elegant home while maximising space and natural light. Just a short 10-minute drive from the stunning beaches of Albufeira, such as Praia dos Salgados and Praia da Galé, and only five minutes from the Algarve Shopping Centre, which offers a variety of shops, restaurants, cinemas, and supermarkets, the property is ideally situated for both permanent living and holiday rental potential.

Guia is famously known as the birthplace of Portugals iconic Frango Piri-Piri, or spicy grilled chicken, and is home to numerous traditional restaurants that draw visitors from across the Algarve and beyond. This unbeatable location adds strong rental appeal for investors and an authentic lifestyle for residents.

The property is currently divided into two fully independent apartments, each with a private entrance. The main apartment features an open-plan kitchen that is fully fitted with modern appliances and seamlessly connects with a bright and stylish living and dining area. On the ground floor, there is a spacious ensuite bedroom, while the first floor is dedicated to the master suite, which offers direct access to a large private balcony with excellent sun exposure, equipped with outdoor furniture perfect for relaxing. From the living area, there is also access to a beautifully designed interior patio, ideal for al fresco dining, with a barbecue area, sofas, and a dining table. This unit is fully air-conditioned with new, high-efficiency units and benefits from solar panel water heating, ensuring energy efficiency and lower operating costs. The home is equipped with high-end double-glazed windows and electric shutters for optimal insulation and comfort.

The second apartment, also fully renovated and modern, includes an open-plan kitchen, dining, and living area that opens onto its own private patio, also designed for outdoor dining and lounging, complete with a barbecue setup. A bathroom is located on the ground floor, while an elegant staircase leads to the large upstairs ensuite bedroom, which is flooded with natural light and features a built-in wardrobe and a modern bathroom with a bathtub. This unit offers the same attention to detail, including quality finishes, electric shutters, double-glazed windows, and tasteful décor.

The property also offers private parking with the possibility of installing an electric vehicle charging station, further enhancing its appeal for sustainable living. While currently divided into two independent units, the house can easily be converted back into a single-family home if desired, offering flexibility depending on your lifestyle or investment goals. Whether you're looking for a stylish and energy-efficient home in an authentic Algarvian village or seeking an attractive rental income opportunity, this property represents an outstanding choice.

Don't miss this rare chance to own a turnkey home with unique character and modern comfort in one of the Algarve's most desirable and well-connected locations. Contact Ideal Homes Portugal today to schedule your visit.

property_title: 3 Bedroom Duplex Apartment For Sale in Albufeira
property_description:
This three bedroom duplex apartment for sale is located in Albufeira, within a prestigious private condominium featuring a swimming pool and well manicured gardens. Sold fully furnished, this apartment is also conveniently located just a short walk distance from the marina and all necessary amenities.

On the first floor, this property comprises an entry hall, a fully fitted kitchen equipped with modern appliances, a bathroom and an open plan living/dining room with direct access to the balcony with stunning views of the marina.

The upper floor boasts three spacious bedrooms, one of which has its own en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, plus an additional bathroom. All bedrooms feature private balconies facing the marina or the communal areas of the condominium.

Residents can enjoy the amenities offered by the complex, including a large swimming pool, two children’s pools, a snack bar, 24-hour reception service, plenty of sunbeds and lounge spaces - everything surrounded by beautifully landscaped gardens.

Additional features include:air-conditioning, double glazed windows, electric shutters, fitted wardrobes and private parking space in the underground garage.

This apartment is just across the road to the vibrant marina of Albufeira, which is known for its wide array of leisure activities, from dining and entertainment to water sports and sandy beaches like Praia de São Rafael and Praia dos Pescadores, both a short six-minute drive away. The charming Old Town Albufeira is only a seven-minute drive, completing this idyllic coastal lifestyle.

property_title: Modern 3-Bedroom Apartment with Sea Views in Exclusive Condominium – Praia de Olhos D’Água, Albufeira
property_description:
Modern 3-Bedroom Apartment with Sea Views in Exclusive Condominium  Praia de Olhos DÁgua, Albufeira

Discover this bright and spacious three-bedroom apartment for sale in the sought-after Praia de Olhos DÁgua area of Albufeira. Located just a short walk from the beach and close to all local amenities, this first-floor apartment combines comfort, style, and an unbeatable location on the Algarve coast.

The property features a large open-plan living and dining area that opens onto a generous front terrace with partial sea views, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The fully equipped modern kitchen and two of the bedrooms enjoy access to a side terrace, offering plenty of natural light and outdoor space. The master bedroom benefits from an en-suite bathroom, while all bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and a bright, airy feel.

Included with the apartment are two private parking spaces and a dedicated storage room in the secure underground garage, all identified with the apartments unit number for convenience and security.

This apartment is part of a private condominium with a rooftop infinity pool and sun deck, offering spectacular panoramic views. The rooftop amenities are accessible exclusively to residents via a private lift. The apartment also comes with an AL license, making it an excellent investment opportunity for holiday rentals or year-round living.

With Faro Airport just 30 minutes away and some of Albufeiras most beautiful beaches, restaurants, shops, and golf courses nearby, this property is perfectly located to enjoy the best of the Algarve.

property_title: 2+2 Bedroom Villa For Sale in Albufeira
property_description:
This 2+2 bedroom villa for sale is located in a residential neighbourhood in Albufeira, just a short drive from the city centre and all its conveniences. Sold furnished, this villa also comes with the benefit of stunning outdoor spaces and tranquil surroundings.

This single story property comprises an inviting entry hall leading to a spacious living and dining room adorned with a cosy fireplace, a fitted kitchen, complete with a convenient pantry, two comfortable bedrooms, two bathrooms, a WC, and two additional rooms currently being used as extra bedrooms.

Externally, there is an expansive covered terrace, perfect for dining and lounging, a BBQ area, a spacious patio just outside the kitchen for morning coffee or al fresco dining, a large swimming pool, plus meticulously maintained gardens throughout the property.

Additional features include:double glazed windows, fitted wardrobes, solar panels and a large garage for private parking.

Located less than a 10 minute drive from Albufeira’s city centre, this property benefits from tranquil surroundings whilst being conveniently close to all amenities, including restaurants, cafes, bars, and even the vibrant marina. You can also find stunning beaches nearby, such as Praia de Albufeira and Praia dos Pescadores just five kilometres away.

property_title: 4 Bedroom Townhouse For Sale in Albufeira
property_description:
A modern four bedroom townhouse for sale in Branqueira. This property is situated within a development of 14 townhouses close to the beach resort of Albufeira. This area is extremely popular with both expats and tourists making these properties an ideal place to live or great holiday homes. 

With three bathrooms and a spacious living space with a fully-fitted kitchen, these townhouses can easily accommodate groups of friends and family. They also offer a private swimming pool which is a lovely place to relax and enjoy the wonderful Algarvian climate. 

Additional features include:air-conditionig, heating, electric shutters and double glazed windows.

Located in a quiet residential area located just five minutes from the bustling town of Albufeira. Ideally situated close enough to enjoy all of the amenities that Albufeira has to offer but far enough away to be able to be a relaxing retreat, this townhouse is perfect for holiday makers or those looking to relocate. 

Albufeira in the Central Algarve, attracts thousands of visitors every year and it's easy to understand why! There is Albufeira old town with its pretty cobbled streets lined with restaurants, bars, cafes and shops and the lively nightlife in São João, Albufeira marina with its sugar candy coloured apartments and last but not least the lovely, sandy beaches. Albufeira is perfect for families, couples and singles of all ages and is central for all the tourist attractions, with the added bonus of a short transfer from Faro airport!
